Don't waste your time, noobs. This isn't legit.

this is for the first Bioshock game, version v1.0.0.0

you have to first start Bioshock the game, then after the game is loaded (when your character is inside the game), THEN press Alt+Tab to return to windows and start this trainer.

after you start the trainer, return back to game, and press the numbers on the numpad accordingly, make sure the Num-Lock is on.

READ the txt file.

it works fine for me, thank you for sharing.
